# Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.Motion

This package provides motion control components for TwinCAT HMI applications.

## Usage

Add `Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.Motion` to your TwinCAT HMI project to enable motion control features and integrate axis and drive management into your HMI interface.

## Documentation

For detailed usage and configuration, refer to the [Beckhoff TwinCAT HMI documentation](https://infosys.beckhoff.de/content/1033/te2000_tc3_hmi_engineering/index.html).
